title: Migrate keepmetadata and removemetadata to valid evaluation time item operations
body:
They are only supported by build time items.
- removemetadata: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms171453.aspx#BKMK_RemoveMetadata
- keepmetadata: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms171453.aspx#BKMK_KeepMetadata
